product_name: Sierra Designs Hellion Jacket - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Fully lined with cozy polyester fur, the Sierra Designs Hellion women's jacket is sure to become a staple in your outdoor arsenal. Windproof polyester shell sports a Durable Water Repellent to fend off light showers. Lined with 100% polyester fur for warmth and next-to-skin softness. Center stormflap backs zipper to keep chilly drafts out. Helmet-compatible hood features a visor to keep wayward snowflakes out of your eyes. Underam vents keep air circulating when you pick up the pace. Pockets abound in the Sierra Designs Hellion jacket-2 zippered hand pockets, 1 zippered chest pocket, 1 zippered interior pocket, and 1 slip-in pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Fully lined with cozy polyester fur, the Sierra Designs Hellion women's jacket is sure to become a staple in your outdoor arsenal.
